title: Community Stations Fieldwork
description: Course is attached to a four-unit field-based internship in the UC San Diego Community Stations. Topics will vary by term and include such issues as migration and asylum; emergency and affordable housing; health and educational disparities; and urban and environmental justice. Strong emphasis is placed on the ethics of university-community engagement and horizontal methods of “coproduction.” P/NP grades only. May be taken for credit one time, and the four units may be used for credit toward the political science majors (in the elective section) or general political science minor. Prerequisites: department approval.
